00065     class _OgreExport Overlay : public OverlayAlloc

00071         String mName;
00073         SceneNode* mRootNode;

00075         // OverlayContainers, linked list for easy sorting by zorder later
00076         // Not a map because sort can be saved since changes infrequent (unlike render queue)
